name: Portrait of Anxiety
description: Surrealistrasyon//Şerif Gümüşbaş//Dry crayons drawing//I believe that the reason for many of our seemingly normal behavior is our anxiety that we are not aware of. In this case, what we experience while trying to escape from anxiety is more fake than anxiety. And Also, I think many of our worries are fake//Drawing is an impressive communication technique for me with its universal but differentiating structure in every viewer. I also like and use the Automatism method because it's an interesting and effective way to express yourself and people who experience the world like you.
